content:
The given code defines option specifications for a Pmw megawidget (ValuatorGroup) used to control RGB color values of nodes or lights in a 3D application, setting defaults for type, dimensionality, labels, value ranges, and update commands.

#define the megawidget options
        INITOPT = Pmw.INITOPT
        optiondefs = (
            ('type',            FLOATER,                INITOPT),
            ('dim',             DEFAULT_DIM,            INITOPT),
            ('side',            tk.TOP,                 INITOPT),
            # A list of initial values, one for each valuator
            ('value',           DEFAULT_VALUE,          INITOPT),
            ('min',             None,                   INITOPT),
            ('max',             None,                   INITOPT),
            ('resolution',      None,                   INITOPT),
            ('numDigits',       2,                      self._setNumDigits),
            # A tuple of labels, one for each valuator
            ('labels',          DEFAULT_LABELS,         self._updateLabels),
            # The command to be executed when one of the valuators is updated
            ('command',         None,                   None),
